entry.title: Python for Networking Devices
entry.summary:
Description

The Internet is a series of tubes and at the end of those tubes are: networking devices! To form the Internet as we know it, each provider network has to be managed, maintained and interconnected. Traditional Network Engineering is moving more and more towards automated device and service management, a task often performed in Python due to the availability of many useful libraries. This talk will walk you though common tasks in Network Engineering and introduce a number of Python libraries that are helpful in accessing and managing networking equipment.
